about_me:
This is the public version; for the most accurate and detailed CV, please connect with me on LinkedIn.

My passion for AI—particularly in Computer Vision—drives my ambition to pursue a Master’s program and advance my current and future career. During my undergraduate studies, that motivation wasn’t initially well reflected. Nevertheless, this marked a turning point in my academic journey, inspiring a stronger commitment that resulted in excellent grades in the Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence & Expert Systems modules. Moreover, one of my lecturers, who was diagnosed with cancer during adolescence and successfully overcame it, inspired my aspiration to focus future academic research on medical or facial recognition purposes.
My professional career started as an IT Support Specialist and now continues as a DevOps Engineer. With nearly three years of experience, I’m thrilled to embark on my M.Sc. in AI and to leverage my professional and academic background effectively.

work_experience.title: DevOps Engineer (Hybrid)
work_experience.content:
• Migrated disaster-recovery servers to Docker, Ansible, and GitLab CI/CD pipelines
• Led Massive PostgreSQL migration
• Monitoring & troubleshooting with Kibana, Zabbix, ELK Stack including Elasticsearch
• Involved in Agile sprints of the development team, contributing to features development and enhancements.

work_experience.title: IT Support Specialist
work_experience.content:
• Resolved critical incidents via log analysis (Nginx, API Gateway, uWSGI)
• Automated workflows and contributed hotfixes to backend services

education.title: Computer Engineering
education.content:
GPA: ≈ 3.3 
Foreign Languages:
• English: IELTS Academic 6.5 (2025)

featured_project.title: Eye-Zoom – Real-Time Eye Tracking for Accessibility
featured_project.description: Developed a hands-free web browser controller using Python + OpenCV (Haar Cascade classifiers) that detects and tracks eye movements in real time. Designed specifically for users with severe physical disabilities.
featured_project.features: • Zoom in/out (& basic navigation in future) via eye gestures

interests: Teaching computer literacy to elderly (250+ hours experience)
